bootstrap-components-desc: Allows to use various bootstrap components inside mediawiki markup.
bootstrap-components-lua-error-no-compon: No component name provided for mw.bootstrap.parse.
bootstrap-components-lua-error-invalid-c: Invalid component name passed to mw.bootstrap.parse: $1.
bootstrap-components-badge-content-missi: You must specify a text for this badge.
bootstrap-components-button-target-missi: You must specify a target for this button.
bootstrap-components-button-target-inval: You must specify a valid target for this button.
bootstrap-components-carousel-images-mis: There are no images set in the carousel.
bootstrap-components-glyph-icon-name-mis: You must specify an icon name.
bootstrap-components-label-content-missi: You must specify a label text.
bootstrap-components-modal-text-missing: You must specify a text for this modal button.
bootstrap-components-popover-heading-mis: You must specify a heading for this popover.
bootstrap-components-popover-text-missin: You must specify a text for this popover.
bootstrap-components-tooltip-content-mis: This tooltip is missing its text attribute and therefore the actual tooltip.
bootstrap-components-tooltip-target-miss: You must specify text or an image, the tooltip should be added to.
